An open-source notifier for Shorter Finance. Explore incoming changes on Ethereum with multi-event support.

Shorter Alarm extension allows quick access to the user activities interacting with Shorterâ€™s protocols. Keep you sensible to real-time issues and catch opportunities to make profits.
Stop reloading the web pages continuously, and be productive.

Notifies you when these events occur:
- New proposal
- Proposal passed
- Proposal failed
- Position opened
- New liquidation

- Liquidation aborted
- Tanto bidding from anyone

Make Shorter Alarm 5 star extension with great reviews!
